paper_abstract: An extension of the differential transformation method (DTM), which is an analytical-numerical method for solving the fuzzy differential equation (FDE), is given. The concept of generalised H-differentiability is used. This concept is based on an enlargement of the class of differentiable fuzzy mappings; to define this, the lateral Hukuhara derivatives are considered. The proposed algorithm is illustrated by numerical examples, and some error comparisons are made with other methods for solving a FDE. (C) 2008 Published by Elsevier Inc.
paper_title: Solving fuzzy differential equations by differential transformation method
